Verses: 1 pinnum Avar: Manupuththirane, Savaragan Kaththiyaagiya Karukkaana Kaththiyai Vaangi, Adhinaal Un Thalaiyaiyum Un Thaadiyaiyum Siraiththukkondu, Pinbu Nirukkum Tharaasai Eduththu, Andha Mayiraip Pangidakkadavaai.

2 moondril Oru Pangai Eduththu Mutrikkaipodum Naatkal Mudigirapodhu Nagaraththin Naduvile Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu, Moondril Oru Pangai Eduththu, Adhai Sutrilum Kaththiyaale Vetti, Moondril Oru Pangai Eduththuk Kaatrile Thootrakkadavaai; Avaigalin Pinnaaga Naan Pattayaththai Uruvuven.
3 adhil Konjam Maaththiram Eduththu, Adhai Un Vasthiraththorangalil Mudindhuvaippaayaaga.
4 pinnum Adhil Konjam Eduththu, Adhaith Theeyin Naduvil Erindhu, Adhai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaayaaga; Adhilirundhu Isravel Vamsaththaar Anaivarukkum Virodhamaaga Akkini Purappadum.
5 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Idhuve Erusalem, Purajaadhigalin Naduvile Naan Adhai Vaiththen, Adhai Sutrilum Dhesangal Irukkiradhu.

6 adhu Purajaadhigalaippaarkkilum En Nyaayangalaiyum, Thannai Sutrilum Irukkira Dhesangalaippaarkkilum En Kattalaigalaiyum Akkiramamaaga Maatrippottadhu; Avargal En Nyaayangalai Veruththu, En Kattalaigalil Nadavaamar Ponaargal.

7 aagaiyaal Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Ungalai Sutrilum Irukkira Purajaadhigalaippaarkkilum Adhigarikkiravargalaagiya Neengal En Kattalaigalile Nadavaamalum, En Nyaayangalinpadi Seyyaamalum, Ungalai Sutrilum Irukkira Purajaadhigaludaiya Needhinyaayangalinpadiyaavadhu Nadavaamalum Ponapadiyinaale,
8 idho, Naan, Naane Unakku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Purajaadhigaludaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Un Naduvile Needhi Seluththi,
9 naan Munbu Seyyaadhadhum Inichcheyyaadhiruppadhumaanavidhamaai Unakku Un Ellaa Aruvaruppugalinimiththamum Seyven.

10 aadhalaal Un Naduvile Pidhaakkal Pillaigalaith Thinbaargal; Pillaigal Pidhaakkalaith Thinbaargal; Naan Unnil Needhiseluththi Unnil Meedhiyaayiruppavargalaiyellaam Sagala Thisaigalilum Sidharippogappannuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

11 aadhalaal, Seeyendrigazhappadaththakkadhum Aruvarukkappadaththakkadhumaana Un Kiriyaigalaal Nee En Parisuththa Sthalaththaith Theettuppaduththinapadiyaal En Kan Unnaith Thappavidaadhu, Naan Unnaik Kurugippogappannuven, Naan Irangamaatten, Idhai En Jeevanaik Kondu Sollugiren Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar.

12 unnile Moondril Oru Pangu Kollainoyaal Saavaargal, Panjaththaalum Un Naduvile Madindhupovaargal; Moondril Oru Pangu Unnai Sutrilum Irukkira Pattayaththaal Vettundu Vizhuvaargal; Moondril Oru Pangai Naan Sagala Thisaigalilum Sidharippogappanni, Avargal Pinne Pattayaththai Uruvuven.

13 ippadi En Kobam Niraiverum; Ippadi Naan En Ukkiraththai Avargalmel Thangappannugiradhinaal Ennai Aatrikkolven; Naan En Ukkiraththai Avargalil Niraivetrumpodhu, Karththaraagiya Naan En Vairaakkiyaththile Idhaip Pesinen Endru Arivaargal.
14 kadandhupogira Yaavarudaiya Kangalukku Munbaagavum Un Sutruppuraththaaraagiya Jaadhigalukkulle Naan Unnaip Paazhum Nindhaiyumaakkuven.

15 naan Kobaththaalum Ukkiraththaalum Kodiya Thandanaigalaalum, Unnil Needhiseluththumpodhu, Un Sutruppuraththaaraagiya Jaadhigalukku Adhu Nindhaiyum Dhurkkeerththiyum Echcharippum Bramippumaai Irukkum; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen.

16 ungalai Azhippadharku Naan Anuppum Azhivukkedhuvaana Panjaththin Kodiya Ambugalai Naan Avargalukkulle Eyyumpodhu, Naan Panjaththai Ungalmel Adhigarikkappanni, Ungal Appam Ennum Aadharavukolai Muriththuppoduven.

17 panjaththaiyum, Unnaip Pillaiyillaamarpogappannum Dhushtamirugangalaiyum Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Anuppuven; Kollainoyum Raththanchindhudhalum Unnil Sutriththiriyum; Pattayaththai Naan Unmel Varappannuven; Karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen Endraar.
